summary: Hi, I seen that the mere 75 gold for a Cave Bear and Snow Bear pelt was Kind of Rediculous, With this mod there is a way to accrue Money By Farming and Hunting Animal Skins, and Tusks to sell for your Main Staple of Septims.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, I seen that the mere 75 gold for a Cave Bear and Snow Bear pelt was Kind of Rediculous, With this mod there is a way to accrue Money By Farming and Hunting Animal Skins, and Tusks to sell for your Main Staple of Septims.

Amount is as follows

Fox Pelt - 450 gold
Snow Fox Pelt - 600 Gold
Bear Pelt - 1000 Gold
Cave Bear Pelt - 2500 Gold
Snow Bear Pelt - 1800 Gold
Wolf Pelt - 300 Gold
Snow Wolf Pelt - 500 Gold
Werewolf Hide - 600 Gold
Goat Hide - 350 Gold
Deer Hide - 300 Gold
Cow Hide - 200 Gold
SabreCat Pelt - 750 Gold
Snow Sabrecat Pelt - 900 Gold
--------------
Mammoth Tusks - 450 Gold
Horker Tusks - 85 Gold
author: sw33tsp0t
